function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of domain knowledge in workers from crowdsourcing platforms for managing medical information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete medical data in the kgs","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sampling and labeling process might not represent the entire dataset","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for inaccurate similarity computation leading to incorrect matches or nonmatches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unresolved entity pairs leading to incomplete data integration","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of validation for human labeling","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of central schema for covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Naming issues in schemata leading to interference with matching process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of crowdsourced entity resolution approach for finding entity matches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of advanced methods in knowledge extraction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on distant supervision for labeling process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extraction of incorrect triples from medical literature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling and integrating data from multiple sources increases the risk of spreading inaccurate or incomplete information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extraction and integration of unstructured data may lead to the inclusion of irrelevant or outdated information in the knowledge graph","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of semantic understanding in plain texts may result in the extraction of incorrect fact triples, leading to misinformation in the knowledge graph","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of virus data in ncbi database for kg construction may increase the risk of accidental release of sensitive information","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of virus, human proteins, antiviral drugs, and diseases data increases the risk of unintentional release of sensitive information","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extraction of virus taxonomy tree from ncbi and sars-cov-2 phylogeny kg construction may lead to unintentional release of sensitive genetic information","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extraction of knowledge from multiple sources may introduce inconsistencies and errors in the constructed kg","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or misleading data in the case flow information published by provincial health committees","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation or incomplete information in the character kg related to combating the epidemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or outdated hot event organization in the event kg","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Knowledge extraction and fusion process involving human input may introduce errors and biases into the openkg-covid19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate protection and public preventive guidance in the prevention kg may result in the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete information in the medical and health kgs may lead to misinformed treatment decisions for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete coverage of key aspects like health care, epidemiology, and frontline workers in existing covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited diversity of topics covered in existing covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Quality and accuracy of information in openkg-covid19 is not continuously ensured","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low coverage of domain knowledge and sparsity of properties in general-purpose kgs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Majority of cord-19 data set contains unstructured data","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"More than 60% of included papers in cord-19 do not mention covid-19 related terms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear understanding of covid-19 knowledge","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on frontline health care workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for further simulations in different climate zones","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Climate zones variability may impact the effectiveness of the dbaf, leading to varying levels of energy saving potential in different regions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupancy in office areas can lead to easier transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growing concern about energy consumption in buildings may lead to compromises in air quality and disease control measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in air quality due to sustained voc emissions from furniture systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Measurement error in the moisture content readings from the sensors","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate contaminant concentration measurements at the inlet and outlet of the air cleaner","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slow decay of emission rate of formaldehyde and toluene","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of specific chemicals such as formaldehyde and acetaldehyde in the testing process can pose health risks to individuals","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quasi-steady state assumption may lead to inaccurate estimation of emission rates, causing potential misinterpretation of data","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglecting the sink effect term in the mass balance equation may result in underestimation of contaminant levels, leading to inadequate mitigation measures","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low pollutant concentration due to low emitting materials used","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of toluene as the target voc for study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring of single pass efficiency until october 2009","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in filter bed moisture content levels during tests may impact the efficiency of vocs removal and air quality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for microbial growth in the root bed due to the presence of microorganisms and organic compounds","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate moisture control leading to the growth of mold and bacteria in the root bed","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
